name: v1.3.0
body:
## Big Changes
- Chromium 67.0.3391.0 (r549031)
- Anchor-navigation is fixed. See #257
- Page's CSP can be by-passed with [`page.setBypassCSP`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v1.3.0/docs/api.md#pagesetbypasscspenabled). See #1229.

## API changes

#### Added
- [`event: 'page.close'`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v1.3.0/docs/api.md#event-close) (d46e157f19ecce1622cabfc25b2c859a6d37ce4f)
- [`page.setBypassCSP`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v1.3.0/docs/api.md#pagesetbypasscspenabled) (35e34db19863caf9d38cbaf0fd801b22cd078a0a)
- [`elementHandle.boxModel()`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v1.3.0/docs/api.md#elementhandleboxmodel) (41d583829740c204dbb9c1df43cb91db9dc6f566)
- [`PUPPETEER_CHROMIUM_REVISION`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v1.3.0/docs/api.md#environment-variables) (506103556b3dc48ddadb92d7dcfecdd37f3c139b)
- [`puppeteer.launch`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v1.3.0/docs/api.md#puppeteerlaunchoptions) accepts a new argument:
  - `pipe` (94c32e4bc8aedfef48c7ac12cd476bf5524346d7)

#### Changed
- [`page.tracing.stop`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v1.3.0/docs/api.md#tracingstop) (98bb2615adb6815c91efcc59593b49e2ec8c3935) now returns a buffer

## Bug Fixes
- #257 - Hash-only navigation doesn't work
- #563 - `page.screenshot()` rejects when slowMo >= 1000 and https cert is self-signed even with `ignoreHTTPSErrors`
- #1229 - Page with CSP breaks puppeteer
- #1357 - Feature: improve boundingBox method at ElementHandle
- #1429 - slowMo + userDataDir = Error: Protocol error (Browser.close): Target closed.
- #1537 - Test 'userDataDir option should restore cookies' is flaky
- #1834 - Add --disable-dev-shm-usage to default launch flags
- #1936 - When a frame fails to load due to a mixed content issue, the main Page is never considered loaded.
- #2037 - Improve error message for timeouts 
- #2082 - Tests: break into smaller files
- #2148 - Tracing: stop() should return Promise<Buffer>
- #2200 - page.waitForFunction does not support disable timeout
- #2236 - [win10] run coverage -> rm is not defined
- #2279 - TypeScript 2.8.0 fails to lint types
- #2283 - Chromium binary permissions is only -rwx------
- #2295 - page.evaluate() throws and hangs if returned value is an array with Symbol

- Chromium 67.0.3372.0 (r543305)

## Big Changes
- Chromium 66.0.3348.0 (r536395)
- [`BrowserFetcher`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v1.1.0/docs/api.md#class-browserfetcher) API to download chromium instances
- [`response.fromCache()`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v1.1.0/docs/api.md#responsefromcache) and [`response.fromServiceWorker()`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v1.1.0/docs/api.md#responsefromserviceworker) for caching insights
- [`page.waitForXPath()`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v1.1.0/docs/api.md#pagewaitforxpathxpath-options) to wait for XPath selectors

## API Changes

#### Changed:
- [`page.waitFor()`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v1.1.0/docs/api.md#pagewaitforselectororfunctionortimeout-options-args) now treats strings that start with `//` as xpath selectors and falls back to [`page.waitForXPath()`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v1.1.0/docs/api.md#pagewaitforxpathxpath-options) (cb684ebb).
- [`browser.targets()`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v1.1.0/docs/api.md#browsertargets) now reports browser target (fc94f982).

#### Added:
- [`event: 'domcontentloaded'`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v1.1.0/docs/api.md#event-domcontentloaded) (59f6d426)

- [`page.waitForXPath()`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v1.1.0/docs/api.md#pagewaitforxpathxpath-options) (cb684ebb)
- [`frame.click()`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v1.1.0/docs/api.md#frameclickselector-options) (660b6578)
- [`frame.evaluateHandle()`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v1.1.0/docs/api.md#frameevaluatehandlepagefunction-args) (189deb84)
- [`frame.focus()`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v1.1.0/docs/api.md#framefocusselector) (660b6578)
- [`frame.hover()`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v1.1.0/docs/api.md#framehoverselector) (660b6578)
- [`frame.tap()`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v1.1.0/docs/api.md#frametapselector) (660b6578)
- [`frame.type()`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v1.1.0/docs/api.md#frametypeselector-text-options) (660b6578)
- [`frame.waitForXPath()`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v1.1.0/docs/api.md#framewaitforxpathxpath-options) (cb684ebb)
- [`executionContext.frame()`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v1.1.0/docs/api.md#executioncontextframe) (ae22ef30)
- [`response.fromCache()`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v1.1.0/docs/api.md#responsefromcache) (ecc3adc2)
- [`response.fromServiceWorker()`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v1.1.0/docs/api.md#responsefromserviceworker) (ecc3adc2)
- [`response.securityDetails()`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v1.1.0/docs/api.md#responsesecuritydetails) (856c4319)

## Big Changes
- Chromium 65.0.3312.0 (r526987)
- [`page.coverage`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v1.0.0/docs/api.md#class-coverage) namespace with CSS and JavaScript coverage support
- [`page.pdf()`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v1.0.0/docs/api.md#pagepdfoptions) now supports header/footer customization
- XPath support with [`page.$x`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v1.0.0/docs/api.md#pagexexpression)/[`frame.$x`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v1.0.0/docs/api.md#framexexpression)/[`elementHandle.$x`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v1.0.0/docs/api.md#elementhandlexexpression)
- [`target.createCDPSession()`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v1.0.0/docs/api.md#targetcreatecdpsession) to work with the raw Devtools Protocol.

## API Changes

#### Changed:
- `dialog.type` getter became a method [`dialog.type()`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v1.0.0/docs/api.md#dialogtype) (b73737302a5dbfc5cd67f37be8460e53ab4f417f)
- `console.args` getter became a method [`console.args()`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v1.0.0/docs/api.md#consolemessageargs) (b73737302a5dbfc5cd67f37be8460e53ab4f417f)
- `console.text` getter became a method [`console.text()`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v1.0.0/docs/api.md#consolemessagetext) (b73737302a5dbfc5cd67f37be8460e53ab4f417f)
- `console.type` getter became a method [`console.type()`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v1.0.0/docs/api.md#consolemessagetype) (b73737302a5dbfc5cd67f37be8460e53ab4f417f)
- `request.headers` getter became a method [`request.headers()`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v1.0.0/docs/api.md#requestheaders) (b73737302a5dbfc5cd67f37be8460e53ab4f417f)
- `request.method` getter became a method [`request.method()`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v1.0.0/docs/api.md#requestmethod) (b73737302a5dbfc5cd67f37be8460e53ab4f417f)
- `request.postData` getter became a method [`request.postData()`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v1.0.0/docs/api.md#requestpostdata) (b73737302a5dbfc5cd67f37be8460e53ab4f417f)
- `request.resourceType` getter became a method [`request.resourceType()`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v1.0.0/docs/api.md#requestresourcetype) (b73737302a5dbfc5cd67f37be8460e53ab4f417f)
- `request.url` getter became a method [`request.url()`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v1.0.0/docs/api.md#requesturl) (b73737302a5dbfc5cd67f37be8460e53ab4f417f)
- `response.headers` getter became a method [`response.headers()`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v1.0.0/docs/api.md#responseheaders) (b73737302a5dbfc5cd67f37be8460e53ab4f417f)
- `response.ok` getter became a method [`response.ok()`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v1.0.0/docs/api.md#responseok) (b73737302a5dbfc5cd67f37be8460e53ab4f417f)
- `response.status` getter became a method [`response.status()`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v1.0.0/docs/api.md#responsestatus) (b73737302a5dbfc5cd67f37be8460e53ab4f417f)
- `response.url` getter became a method [`response.url()`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v1.0.0/docs/api.md#responseurl) (b73737302a5dbfc5cd67f37be8460e53ab4f417f)
- [`puppeteer.launch`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v1.0.0/docs/api.md#puppeteerlaunchoptions) accepts more options:
  - `handleSIGTERM` (cc0c461ea8ff19f856df95a7a32d24cc9b61126c)
  - `handleSIGHUP` (90ca0073679830bb39b4ce549ff8ed513c8a36ed)
  - `ignoreDefaultArgs` (8a40cd5eef86fe8c3a4894775de8e1d269836857)
- [`page.pdf`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v1.0.0/docs/api.md#pagepdfoptions) allows to customize header and footer with new options:
  - `headerTemplate` (f8040cb2a29214915900231c32103211f24f9f3f)
  - `footerTemplate` (f8040cb2a29214915900231c32103211f24f9f3f)
- [`page.waitFor()`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v1.0.0/docs/api.md#pagewaitforselectororfunctionortimeout-options-args) now accepts `JSHandle`'s as arguments and returns `JSHandle` it resolves to. (05b1aca21e5c2f221373d601d3b8ae6b2a984292)
- [`page.waitForFunction()`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v1.0.0/docs/api.md#pagewaitforfunctionpagefunction-options-args) now accepts `JSHandle`'s as arguments and returns `JSHandle` it resolves to. (05b1aca21e5c2f221373d601d3b8ae6b2a984292)
- [`page.waitForSelector()`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v1.0.0/docs/api.md#pagewaitforselectorselector-options) returns `ElementHandle` it resolves to. (05b1aca21e5c2f221373d601d3b8ae6b2a984292)
- [`page.tracing.start()`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v1.0.0/docs/api.md#tracingstartoptions) can be launched with custom tracing categories
  - `categories` options (5a6488883a34de76ace94e6ca85cede6abc8d487)

- [`target.createCDPSession()`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v1.0.0/docs/api.md#targetcreatecdpsession) (5368051610babf52e7df927c323d315a493fb56f)


## Bug Fixes
- #31 - Expose raw protocol in the API
- #280 - API consistency: property getters vs methods
- #373 - Possibility for page numbers in PDF?
- #537 - Handle XPath selectors
- #754 - [Question] Frame html content

name: v0.13.0
body:
## Big Changes
* Chromium 64.0.3264.0 (r515411)
* [`browser.pages`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v0.13.0/docs/api.md#browserpages) can be used to access all pages in Chromium, even those created by `window.open`. (32398d1)
* [`browser.close`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v0.13.0/docs/api.md#browserclose) now closes Chromium even if used with `pupeteer.connect` (2b79514)

## Api Changes

#### Changed:
* [`PUPPETEER_DOWNLOAD_HOST`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v0.13.0/docs/api.md#environment-variables) can be specified to overwrite host part of URL that is used to download Chromium (945a826)
* [`browser.close`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v0.13.0/docs/api.md#browserclose) now closes Chromium even if used with `pupeteer.connect` (2b79514)
* [`waitUntil`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v0.13.0/docs/api.md#pagegotourl-options) option
  * takes an array of strings (f38c8b)
  * accepts a new set of event strings:
    * `'load'`
    * `'domcontentloaded'` (ef369e5)
    * `'networkidle0'` (ce8a952)
    * `'networkidle2'` (ce8a952)
* `page.setRequestInterceptionEnabled` was renamed to [`page.setRequestInterception`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v0.13.0/docs/api.md#pagesetrequestinterceptionvalue) (ce005d4)
* Keyboard methods now accept both `code` and `key` strings (126ab7b)
* [`frame.waitForSelector`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v0.13.0/docs/api.md#framewaitforselectorselector-options) accepts option `hidden` (e3eec24)
* [`jsHandle.jsonValue`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v0.13.0/docs/api.md#jshandlejsonvalue) now ignores `toJSON` methods on objects (5c92ba2)
* [`request.abort`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v0.13.0/docs/api.md#requestaborterrorcode) accepts an error code (4f64dfd)
* [`page.addStyleTag`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v0.13.0/docs/api.md#pageaddstyletagoptions) and [`page.addScriptTag`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v0.13.0/docs/api.md#pageaddscripttagoptions) now return an ElementHandle for the tag that was added (e0f5b93)
* `page.getMetrics` was renamed to [`page.metrics`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v0.13.0/docs/api.md#pagemetrics) (b9266c7)
* [`page.select`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v0.13.0/docs/api.md#pageselectselector-values) returns an array of all option values that were successfully selected (e70f98d)


#### Added:
* [`event: 'targetchanged'`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v0.13.0/docs/api.md#event-targetchanged) (32398d1)
* [`event: 'targetcreated'`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v0.13.0/docs/api.md#event-targetcreated) (32398d1)
* [`event: 'targetdestroyed'`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v0.13.0/docs/api.md#event-targetdestroyed) (32398d1)
* [`event: 'disconnected'`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v0.13.0/docs/api.md#event-browserdisconnected) (32398d1)
* [`browser.disconnect`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v0.13.0/docs/api.md#browserdisconnect) (03fefb5)
* [`browser.pages`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v0.13.0/docs/api.md#browserpages) (32398d1)
* [`browser.targets`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v0.13.0/docs/api.md#browsertargets) (32398d1)
* [`elementHandle.$`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v0.13.0/docs/api.md#elementhandleselector) (5ffbd0d)
* [`elementHandle.$$`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v0.13.0/docs/api.md#elementhandleselector-1) (5ffbd0d)
* [`frame.select`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v0.13.0/docs/api.md#frameselectselector-values) (fede264)
* [`page.bringToFront`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v0.13.0/docs/api.md#pagebringtofront) (77f5852)
* [`request.failure`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v0.13.0/docs/api.md#requestfailure) (273c733)
* [`request.respond`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v0.13.0/docs/api.md#requestrespondresponse) (bcc969c)
* [`class: Target`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v0.13.0/docs/api.md#class-target) (32398d1)

## Bug Fixes
* #386 - Support anchor navigation
* #443 - Request: browser.currentPage() or similar way to access Pages
* #508 - Recursive $/$$
* #690 - Expose function doesn't add to frames the first time.
* #723 - Keyboard API is confusing
* #733 - Clip rectangles with odd-numbered height and width dimensions produce even-sized images.
* #805 - Waiting for both `load` and `networkIdle`
* #877 - Adopt plznavigate in puppeteer
* #894 - Page closes itself silently
* #901 - Provide reason for failed requests
* #918 - userDataDir + headless = browser and script (node) hang
* #946 -  Provide 'DOMContentLoaded' option for waitUntil in page.goto()
* #951 - Add possibility to configure download mirror
* #955 - coverage script fail on windows
* #989 - No way to close a browser instance that was opened with connect()
* #1003 - Strange breaking change in page.evaluate()
* #1020 - Request Interception enhancements
* #1044 - LICENSE should be fixed
* #1061 - Error when clicking on Shadow DOM element
* #1082 - ElementHandle.click() broken in 0.12
* #1126 - Click doesn't work as expected in non-Headless
* #1139 - Missing ElementHandle.select; impossible (?) to make selection in a frame
* #1163 - Test "Puppeteer.launch should support ignoreHTTPSErrors option" is flaky
* #1173 - waitForNavigation should wait for all frames instead of only main frame
* #1179 - Add an option to set data attributes on elements added by the API
* #1195 - Test `Page.goto should fail when navigating to bad SSL` is flaky
* #1218 - `page.goto` is littered with races
* #1244 - Add page bringToFront method
* #1276 - page.select() should error if it can't find an option with requested value
* #1294 - Broken Click after upgrading to 0.12.0 
* #1315 - elementHandle.screenshot clip object uses wrong y value

5686d53 chore: bump version to 0.13.0-alpha

## Big Changes
- Chromium 64.0.3240.0 (r508693)
- [JSHandles](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v0.12.0/docs/api.md#class-jshandle) are introduced to handle in-page objects
- [`page.queryObjects`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v0.12.0/docs/api.md#pagequeryobjectsprototypehandle) method to query javascript heap
- [`page.getMetrics`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v0.12.0/docs/api.md#pagegetmetrics) and [`event: 'metrics'`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v0.12.0/docs/api.md#event-metrics) to measure page performance 
- [`page.setOfflineMode`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v0.12.0/docs/api.md#pagesetofflinemodeenabled) to test page offline behavior 

## API changes

#### Changed:
- [`PUPPETEER_SKIP_CHROMIUM_DOWNLOAD`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v0.12.0/docs/api.md#environment-variables) is supported in npmrc (2babcb0)
- [`event: 'console'`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v0.12.0/docs/api.md#event-console) dispatches instances of ConsoleMessage instead of array of strings
- [`keyboard.down`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v0.12.0/docs/api.md#keyboarddownkey-options) generates input event by default (6a8865c)
- [`page.addScriptTag`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v0.12.0/docs/api.md#pageaddscripttagoptions) accepts options object instead of URL (c310f13)
- [`page.goBack`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v0.12.0/docs/api.md#pagegobackoptions) accepts `0` to disable timeout (53531c9)
- [`page.goForward`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v0.12.0/docs/api.md#pagegoforwardoptions) accepts `0` to disable timeout (53531c9)
- [`page.goto`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v0.12.0/docs/api.md#pagegotourl-options) accepts `0` to disable timeout (53531c9)
- [`page.pdf`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v0.12.0/docs/api.md#pagepdfoptions) has a new `A6` page format (3f9f0f4)
- [`page.reload`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v0.12.0/docs/api.md#pagereloadoptions) accepts `0` to disable timeout (53531c9)
- [`page.waitForSelector`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v0.12.0/docs/api.md#pagewaitforselectorselector-options) has a new `hidden` option (8511db9)
- [`puppeteer.launch`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v0.12.0/docs/api.md#puppeteerlaunchoptions)
  - added `devtools` option (f1aa18a)
  - added `env` option (c225b93)


#### Added:
- [`class: ConsoleMessage`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v0.12.0/docs/api.md#class-consolemessage) (f625502)
- [`class: ExecutionContext`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v0.12.0/docs/api.md#class-executioncontext) (e6af6e1)
- [`class: JSHandle`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v0.12.0/docs/api.md#class-jshandle) (e6af6e1)
- [`elementHandle.boundingBox`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v0.12.0/docs/api.md#elementhandleboundingbox) (7e28dba)
- [`elementHandle.focus`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v0.12.0/docs/api.md#elementhandlefocus) (0af0d7d)
- [`elementHandle.press`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v0.12.0/docs/api.md#elementhandlepresskey-options) (0af0d7d)
- [`elementHandle.screenshot`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v0.12.0/docs/api.md#elementhandlescreenshotoptions) (7e28dba)
- [`elementHandle.type`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v0.12.0/docs/api.md#elementhandletypetext-options) (0af0d7d)
- [`event: 'metrics'`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v0.12.0/docs/api.md#event-metrics) (b82d319)
- [`page.$$eval`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v0.12.0/docs/api.md#pageevalselector-pagefunction-args) (7a8aa73)
- [`page.addStyleTag`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v0.12.0/docs/api.md#pageaddstyletagoptions) (c310f13)
- [`page.getMetrics`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v0.12.0/docs/api.md#pagegetmetrics) (b82d319)
- [`page.queryObjects`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v0.12.0/docs/api.md#pagequeryobjectsprototypehandle) (23c0ba0)
- [`page.select`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v0.12.0/docs/api.md#pageselectselector-values) (45f2640)
- [`page.setOfflineMode`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/v0.12.0/docs/api.md#pagesetofflinemodeenabled) (a02347e)

#### Removed:
- `page.injectFile` -  `page.addScriptTag` now should be used. (c310f13)
- `page.plaintText` - innerText/textContent could be obtained with `page.evaluate`. (1fbf2a8)

## Bug Fixes
- #63 - Emulate offline
- #241 - Add keyboard.type
- #304 - Add memory heap snapshot API
- #309 - Is there a way to measure page performance?
- #324 - evaluate - strange execute sequence
- #382 - Implement object handles
- #613 - Hwo can I set HTML select element value?
- #625 - Introduce page.$eval and page.$$eval
- #684 - Clicking element inside iFrame does not give any response
- #734 - Request.resourceType doesnt match DevTools
- #744 - Feature request: console level
- #750 - Throw error with stack trace when launching with an invalid executablePath option
- #782 - Constantly getting Navigation Timeout Error
- #839 - Chromium is not closed completely gracefully
- #864 - Is there a way to open DevTools progammaticaly?
- #869 - URI malformed exception that is not handled
- #884 - What is the reason of using a sync version of writeFile for pdf save?
- #892 - Add `addStyleTag(url)` API
- #949 - Replace `injectFile` to `injectScript` and add `injectCSS`
- #1010 - ElementHandle screenshot does not count padding (or add options to count the padding/margin)

name: Release v0.10.0
body:
# Big changes

- Node 6 support! (9212863b92323168fa2ab077ce2f4425a0b3f304)
- Support proxies when Puppeteer downloads Chromium (a00ba6a3d92ab885ab6beae0e06993723e45d6fd)
- Puppeteer now downloads and runs Chromium 62 (r496140)

## API changes

#### Added:
  - [`puppeteer.launch`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/master/docs/api.md#puppeteerlaunchoptions) options (271fd093794aeb91b29941a6eea0f1bc7caff2c4):
    * `handleSIGINT`
    * `timeout`
  - [`page.$$`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/master/docs/api.md#pageselector) (151d512ae2d652d8bc91db1ebcb635fd24a45d1a)
  - [`page.content`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/master/docs/api.md#pagecontent) (598f439a3222e9742797a4c79a3dab0348d70cd1)
  - [`page.cookies`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/master/docs/api.md#pagecookiesurls) (0791774faa78f2a6e2e3a5185c1e266feeecdc91)
  - [`page.deleteCookie`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/master/docs/api.md#pagedeletecookiecookies) (0791774faa78f2a6e2e3a5185c1e266feeecdc91)
  - [`page.emulateMedia`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/master/docs/api.md#pageemulatemediamediatype) (6cc274135c9b68001d4febab11aaec3a7c72b820)
  - [`page.screenshot`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/master/docs/api.md#pagescreenshotoptions) options (127f3966d72cbab1b3bf36db065363becd37655f):
    * `omitBackground`
  - [`page.setCookie`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/master/docs/api.md#pagesetcookiecookies) (0791774faa78f2a6e2e3a5185c1e266feeecdc91)
  - [`page.setJavaScriptEnabled`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/master/docs/api.md#pagesetjavascriptenabledenabled) (a1414de42fe1451bf7fadc2ad2a6c2035f309994)
  - [`elementHandle.uploadFile`](https://github.com/GoogleChrome/puppeteer/blob/master/docs/api.md#elementhandleuploadfilefilepaths) (5f0afd5547eef746e94e95c87f6cc633f73a75ce)

#### Removed:
  - `page.uploadFile` (5f0afd5547eef746e94e95c87f6cc633f73a75ce)

## Bug Fixes
- #53 - Add Cookies API
- #316 - Support Node 6
- #462 - Block scripts
